DIRECT ENTRY  
ILORIN accepts passes in the following:     a) 
ACIS.  
b) LL.B UNIVERSITY OF LONDON.  
c) two (2) year Diploma in Law of an accredited Government 
Institution at  upper credit .  
d) 'A’ level pass in Literature in English may be considered in 
lieu of UTME requirement in Literature in English.  
e) Degree holders need not possess Literature in English.  
f) Where a Diploma is of four grades: Distinction, Credit, Merit 
and Pass – Credit grade is accepted for Direct Admission.  
  
UTME  SUBJECTS  
ILORIN requires Literature in English plus any two (2) subjects.
